thread.section_title: Mandarin Oriental, Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Look no further!
thread.title_full: Look no further! - Review of Mandarin Oriental, Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: R8524NFmichelep
title: Look no further!
text: The Mandarin Paris is an outstanding hotel and I've stayed in several in Paris. The mix of Parisienne Classicism and Modernity are welcoming, beautiful, sexy and sophisticated. The staff is outstanding from the front desk to any and all other needs or uses you will have here. The Camillia Room for breakfast is beautiful as are their morning selections. The hotel is very very clean and completely organized. The Bar is lovely and inviting as well as the outdoor patio. No need to stay anywhere else.
